name: LD30 - Connected Pylons
description:
Ludum Dare #30 Compo entry "Connected Pylons" (Theme: Connected Worlds)

2014 version updated with Unity 2021.3.11f1 and exported to WebGL platform

Puzzle/Action

- Use the arrow keys to move the green character.
- Push the blocks to create an enlighten link from the light pylon to the dark pylon.
- Avoid the bad guys or crush them with blocks.

Archive.org copy of the LudumDare 2014 Page, with rating and comments.

Source Unity3D project on GitHub
